CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ProductHierarchy__c = "Z0001S0001PU000002", ProductHierarchy__c = "Z0001S0001PU000003", ProductHierarchy__c = "Z0001S0001PU000004", ProductHierarchy__c = "Z0001S0001CP000002", ProductHierarchy__c = "Z0001S0001CP000004", ProductHierarchy__c = "Z0001S0001"), TotalPrice,0)
